Recommendations: 1. Student Body should be included to participate in the planning process for each community extension program.

2. To properly document all the undertaken institution with regards to the planning, implementation, evaluation, assessment, and re planning of community extension program. Of particular mention are document proofs for the following: a. involvement of stakeholders; b. design and dissemination of extension program; c. proof of sustainability and adaptability of the extension project; d. periodic monitoring and evaluation of activities; e. results of monitoring, evaluation, and program feedback from training recipients; f. re-planning and improvement of extension services: g. accomplishment/terminal report timely; h. accomplishment report duly marked by the Records Office for reference purposes; i. utilization of allocated budget; and j. sourcing of funds and materials.
3. The institution should have its monitoring and evaluation instrument.
